original_title: Alex Ovechkin: A Calder Trophy Tribute
overview: Team released highlight video package from Alexander Ovechkin's Calder Trophy-winning rookie year.  Includes video of all goals scored, Calder Trophy award ceremony, NHL Network's top 10 goals segment, and in-game/TV video spots (including 2 on the Town with Matt Bradley at the DC car show and the shaving cream pie incident).
title: Alex Ovechkin: A Calder Trophy Tribute
